article_text: A blog from The State's political team of Cassie Cope and Jamie Self.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Columbia, sc, politics, senate, affordable care act, obamacare, working poor, health, insurance, medicaid
article_metadata.description: Senate budget writers scuttled a proposal Thursday to create a program that would have used federal and state dollars to pay for private health insurance for almost 200,000 South Carolinians.
article_metadata.title: Senators scrap plan to insure 194,000 working poor in S.C. | The State
